title: Terms of Use Requirement Parameters
description: JSON schema for Terms of Use Requirement Parameters, used for a 'tier 2' Access Requirement

isURL.description: 'true'/'false', this flag says whether the termsOfUse field is a URL or the document itself

termsOfUse.description: Terms Of Use for Access, either the document itself or a URL to the document
termsOfUse.title: Terms Of Use
